typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		lccuwsign as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select distinct lccuwsign from dwh_stage.p_lcctable',
	format: 'query') ~> lcctable
source(output(
		lcauwsign as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select distinct lcauwsign from dwh_stage.p_lcatable',
	format: 'query') ~> lcatable
source(output(
		code_type_id as long,
		source_system as string,
		target_code as string,
		source_code_key as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'Select code_type_id, source_system,  target_code, source_code_key from dwh_stage.t_crossreference',
	format: 'query') ~> crossreference
source(output(
		ad_name as string,
		costcenter as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select  ad_name, costcenter from dwh_stage.s_udv_ags_employee ',
	format: 'query') ~> sUdvAgsEmployee
source(output(
		description as string,
		cc_value as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'Select description , cc_value from dwh_stage.s_udv_orgunit',
	format: 'query') ~> sUdvOrgunit
lcctable, lcatable union(byName: false)~> LCCjoinLCA
crossreference filter(code_type_id==329 && source_system == 'PARIS') ~> CodeTypeEmployee
LookupCostCenter derive(PK_pre_dim_claim_team = concat('P',RemoveDuplicates@lccuwsign),
		last_updated_by = 'M_PRE_DIM_CLAIM_TEAM') ~> AddKeyAndUpdatedBY
LCCjoinLCA aggregate(groupBy(lccuwsign),
	lccuwsign_aggr = first(lccuwsign)) ~> RemoveDuplicates
sUdvAgsEmployee, sUdvOrgunit join(costcenter == cc_value,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> EmployeeViewUDV
AddKeyAndUpdatedBY select(mapColumn(
		sign_lcarcsign = lccuwsign_aggr,
		source_code_key,
		tem_key = costcenter,
		tem_description = description,
		PK_pre_dim_claim_team,
		last_updated_by
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectOutputColumns
SelectOutputColumns alterRow(upsertIf(!isNull(PK_pre_dim_claim_team))) ~> AlterRow
RemoveDuplicates, CrossrefJOINEmployee lookup(toString(RemoveDuplicates@lccuwsign) == source_code_key,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupCostCenter
CodeTypeEmployee, EmployeeViewUDV join(target_code == ad_name,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CrossrefJOINEmployee
AlterRow sink(input(
		pk_pre_dim_claim_team as string,
		date_inserted as timestamp,
		last_updated_by as string,
		inserted_by as string,
		emp_id_main_adjuster as decimal(28,10),
		tem_description as string,
		sign_lcacrsign as string,
		date_last_updated as timestamp,
		tem_key as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['pk_pre_dim_claim_team'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		pk_pre_dim_claim_team = PK_pre_dim_claim_team,
		tem_description,
		sign_lcacrsign = sign_lcarcsign,
		tem_key,
		last_updated_by
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> PreDimClaimTeam
